Test Name: Urine Macroscopic Analysis with Reflex Microscopic Analysis and Culture (UA Reflex Culture)
Specimen Type: Freshly voided midstream clean-catch urine (or catheterized urine)
Purpose: To provide accurate and reliable results for diagnosing urinary tract infections and other urinary diseases through macroscopic urinalysis with reflex microscopic examination and culture when indicated.
Equipment: Urinalysis strip reader, microscope, centrifuge, incubator, calibrated pipettes, refrigerator/freezer
